frameset.note: Frames file for 'put' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus

example.name: Arg0 rel Arg1 Arg2-LOC
example.text: Wilder has put the onus on Cole.

example.name: Arg0 ArgM-TMP rel Arg1 Arg2-LOC
example.text: Japanese companies often put their money behind odd projects.

example.name: Arg0 rel Arg1 ArgM Arg2-LOC
example.text: It's too late *trace=empty* to put the genie back in the bottle.

example.name: Arg0 rel Arg1
example.text: As Dorothy Arighi puts it, blah blah blah

example.name: Arg0 rel Arg1 Arg2-as
example.text: The pilots put the amount as high as $100 million.

example.name: Arg1 rel Arg2-PRD Arg0-by
example.text: That fund was put together by Blackstone Group.

example.name: Arg0 rel Arg1
example.text: Many salarymen put in unproductive overtime hours.

example.name: Arg0 rel Arg2-for Arg1 Arg0 rel Arg2-to
example.text: *t* Never put off for tomorrow what you can put off to the day after that.

example.name: Arg1 rel Arg0-by
example.text: Japanese investors are put off by American exuberance.

example.name: Arg0 rel Arg1
example.text: The occasional Englishman puts on airs.

example.name: Arg0 rel Arg1 ArgM-TMP
example.text: Smokers must put out their cigarettes before entering the building.

example.name: Arg0 rel Arg1
example.text: John put out a report about PAS tagging.

roleset.name: furnish

example.name: Arg0 rel Arg1 Arg2-for
example.text: Few banks will put up new money for New Zealand.

roleset.note: "hard put" is an adjective and should not be tagged as a verb. We would be hard put *trace=we* to call it a game.

example.name: they pretty much all look like this
example.text: Even with mutual funds, the little investor continues *trace* to put up with high fees, high commissions and poor performance, while index-fund managers slowly amass a better record with lower fees, lower commissions and less risk.
example.arg: high fees , high commissions and poor performance

frameset.note: I'm probably still missing a few phrasals, but you get the picture. If you find any others, please add them.
